channel.title: [317]Arctic Pkz[317]
channel.description:
Hey guys Welcome!!
Ok the base is Project Insanity and i will tell you what spots are open and let me tell you this will be a big project so.. please apply!
Ok the Features are:
Skillcapes in the client
New Interfaces
Perfect PvP and PvN
Good Econemy
Almost all skills are 100% some skills arent added but will be added sometime today or tomorrow
100% Dueling
100% Teleblock
Theres alot more features cant think of any
Some of our Goals are:
[s]1.need to add skillcapes serversided[/s] - Done
2. Some Done - Some Bug fixes
3. Some Dupe Fixes
4. Some Quests Added (About 3 Quests so they wont be bored pking the whole time)
5. Some other Stuff If you become one of the spots then i will add you on msn and we will talk more
6. adding godsword stances right now
[shadow=red,left]Some pics on Skillcape Emotes![/shadow]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/nf1gsy.jpg[/img]
The Application for any of those spots thanks!

item.title: [317]Arctic Pkz[317]
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

Real Name: Not saying on mopar, pm me if you need/want to know.
Age:14
What Spot you Want: I would like to be Server/Client Coder. Main coder for one or the other if possible.
How long have you been coding that language for: Java: 2+ years, HTML: 3 years just about.
Any Proof of Coding: I can show you my work later on.
Additional Information: I can code all day. Mostly. And can do everything that is needed to be done.
Will you Stay with us: Yes, if a good amount of people are online, and its not a complete failure of an idea…
How long you will be on a day: All day if necessary.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Arctic Pkz[317]
item.dc:creator: @polarx1 polarx1
item.description:
@polarx1 wrote:

[quote=“ajs47951, post:7, topic:342316”]Real Name: Andrew Spiker
Age:16
What Spot you Want:Server Coder or Beta Tester
How long have you been coding that language for:Java/3years
Any Proof of Coding: }

public void openshop(Player p, int shopid) {
    switch (shopid) {
        case 1:
            shopopen(p, 868);
            generalStore = true;
            items  = Engine.shops.Generalshoplumb;
            itemsN = Engine.shops.GeneralshoplumbN;
            p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN);//Shop Inventory
            p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, items, itemsN);//Main Stock
        break;

Additional Information: I have all CS5 programs "like Photo shop, Dreamweaver… And i can get you any program or game you need for free…
Will you Stay with us:12 years or more
How long you will be on a day: All most all the time. “I live on the pc” lol [/quote]

your accepted pm me!

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Arctic Pkz[317]
item.dc:creator: @ajs47951 ajs47951
item.description:
@ajs47951 wrote:

Real Name: Andrew Spiker
Age:16
What Spot you Want:Server Coder or Beta Tester
How long have you been coding that language for:Java/3years
Any Proof of Coding: }

public void openshop(Player p, int shopid) {
    switch (shopid) {
        case 1:
            shopopen(p, 868);
            generalStore = true;
            items  = Engine.shops.Generalshoplumb;
            itemsN = Engine.shops.GeneralshoplumbN;
            p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN);//Shop Inventory
            p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, items, itemsN);//Main Stock
        break;

Additional Information: I have all CS5 programs "like Photo shop, Dreamweaver… And i can get you any program or game you need for free…
Will you Stay with us:12 years or more
How long you will be on a day: All most all the time. “I live on the pc” lol

Read full topic
